Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Technique: POLISHED; INCISED; PRESSED IN A FORM/MODEL
Name: Necklace
Description: Lovely necklace comprised of a central round carnelian bead framed by round amethyst beads, decreasing in size. These are interjected by blue enamel disc-shaped beads of a type widespread in Nubia during the Middle Kingdom and the Second Intermediate Period.
